channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 11:38 Close the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 11:38 Close the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 10:23 Flashing anxiety in Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 10:23 Flashing anxiety in Kharkiv Oblast.
